resources.string: Placeholder for various shit\nand naked chicks!!!
One rom to rule them all
Tuner offers limited SystemUI modifications. Link has been added to AicpExtras for easier access.\nHere you can also add new tiles.
Visit the AICP download page for your device
Visit our Gerrit to know what we are working on
Nothing to see here yet, move along
Permission Granted, Now you can write to storage.
Permission Denied, You cannot write to storage.
Include foreground task when clearing all
Display the app icon corresponding with the toast
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
This will hide all Immersive Mode messages
This will hide all force close notificaitons
Press on color below to apply
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Hide the arrows in the traffic indicators
Superuser indicator is visible when a session is active
Toggle to show superuser indicator when a session is active
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Shows icon when headsets are connected.
Could not load %s. Make sure you have storage available.
Select where the weather temperature is shown on the statusbar
Shows clock at the top while in fullscreen
Shows date at the top while in fullscreen
Configure location for weather widget and other settings
Enable to show weather options that go along with LockClock
Show basic weather in the extended statusbar area
Pick an icon for displaying the weather condition
Enable to colorize all icons, disable to colorize only the monochrome icons
Choose when the weather panel should be hidden
The weather panel will be hidden, when the visible notifications will reach the maximum allowed notifications on the lock screen
The weather panel will be hidden, when the visible notifications will reach the choosen number of notifications (%s)
The weather panel won\'t be hidden
Choose the number of notifications to hide the weather panel
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Blurs and displays the content behind your lock screen.
Show power menu on the lock screen
Help AICP by opting into anonymous statistics reporting

Opting into AICP Stats will allow non-personal data to be submitted to our servers. The information submitted includes an unique identifier, which does not compromise your privacy or personal data. The data is submitted every 7 days.\n\nFor an example of the data that is submitted, tap on Preview Data.
Show circle app launcher after touching right side of screen
Apps will show in app circle bar
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Lock screen wallpaper set back to default
Use OmniSwitch instead of default recents view
Make sure you have enabled OmniSwitch. You can do this by using \"Settings\" below
Double tap lockscreen to put the device to sleep
Customize PA Pie 2.0 targets, sytle, size and color
Pie will be always shown on the right while in landscape
Whether or not the menu button should always be shown, even when its not needed
Select the location where the Pie will be placed
Adjust the gap that separates the Pie elements
Adjust the angle of pie\'s egdes from the attachment
Manage how animations and status additions will be handled
Enable expand quick settings panel button
Enable/Disable action for the task manager button in the expanded statusbar area
This tool allows you to delete system apps. Use with caution and only delete apps you know are safe to be removed.
Are you sure you want to delete this app?
Be patient for the logs to be created
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
Enable to show AICP logo on the left side of statusbar
Choose which side to display the logo on, left or right
Set custom animations for system keyboard
Launch the default music app when headset is connected
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in recents view
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Show a bar with the device\'s available memory
Show search bar in recents menu
recent recents disable enable show hide search bar searchbar
Plays sound effect when screenshot is taken
Show a brightness icon to the left of the brighness slider to adjust auto-brightness
Add, remove, and position items in sidebar
Position the sidebar on the left or right side of the screen
Display a visible tab on the side which will display the sidebar when touched.
Display the tab on the top, middle, or bottom on the side of the screen.
Change the size of the visible tab.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Disables quick settings in the keyguard for a secure lock only
Longpress power button while screen is off to turn on flashlight
Will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Number of QS tiles per row

For better visibility on bright images
For better visibility on themed headers
Pick which apps to exclude from the recents panel.

Whether to allow global use of float mode, if this is off none of the below options will work DUH!!!
Launch Slim & Pie Actions in Floating Window Mode
Launch Gesture Anywhere shortcuts in float mode

Use the settings below to modify the AE appearance

Halo will appear for incoming tasks and scroll out of sight after a while
When opening an app with Halo the underlying app will get paused
Show message box for incoming notifications
Halo will ping when device is unlocked if new notifications were received
Enable Halo button in statusbar header
Always launch activities from notifications in Float Mode.
You need to enable Halo to get all the options
Defines how big Halo is going to be
Halo message box animation for incoming notifications
Blur the background when you pull down the status bar
Blur the background of status bar header
Blur the background of QS panel
Blur the background of recents apps
Blur personalizations are disabled during Keyguard view! Only Translucent Notifications are enabled! QS header and panel transparency are automatically disabled!
Theme elements to change when a new theme is selected
